title: COVID-19 Hot Spots Re-Emerging in New York City
itunes:title: COVID-19 Hot Spots Re-Emerging in New York City
description:
Dr. Bruce Farber, Chief of Infectious Diseases at Northwell Health, discusses coronavirus hot spots in New York City. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Businessweek Features Writer Ashlee Vance talk about an aviation outsider building a supersonic jet for transatlantic travel. We get Businessweek Economics with Rhea Thomas, Economist at Wilmington Trust. And we Drive to the Close with Leo Kelly, CEO of Verdence Capital Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
